thread.title: Manchester United news: Paul Scholes aims dig at Arsenal over Europa League ambition | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United news: Paul Scholes aims dig at Arsenal over Europa League ambition | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United news: Paul Scholes aims dig at Arsenal over Europa League ambition | Metro News
text:
They want him to fail! Ozil's agent says he feels bullied at Arsenal 
‘I think I’d rather win the Europa League (than finish fourth),’ he told Republik of Mancunia . 
‘Winning a trophy, winning a medal, great trip for the fans, go to Sweden themselves for a couple of days, would be nice.’ Scholes won two Champions League titles in his playing days (Picture: Getty) 
When it was put to him that chasing the top four over silverware was like Arsenal, he responded: ‘Yeah, exactly. We don’t want that, settling for top four. 
‘But I don’t think there’s any doubt we’ll finish top four anyway.’ 
Arsenal have a good record of qualifying for the Champions League but are once again heading out of the competition early after a 5-1 first-leg defeat to Bayern Munich in the last 16.
